===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}}: a line [[above]] another (contrast {{l|zh|下}}) — [[up]].

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-tjaŋ}}.

===Pronunciation 1===
{{zh-pron
|m=shàng
|c=soeng6
|h=pfs=song
|md=siông
|mn=xm,qz,tw:siōng/xm,zz:siāng
|mn_note=Xiamen siāng - only used for "most; extremely"
|w=3zaan
|mc=2
|oc=3,2
|ma=y
|cat=n,post,a,v
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[upper]] [[part]]; [[high]] [[position]]; [[up]]
#: {{zh-ant|下}}
# {{†}} [[emperor]]
# [[on]]; [[above]]
#* {{zh-x|樹 上|'''on''' the tree}}
#* {{zh-x|筆 在 桌 上。|The pen is on the desk.}}
# [[superior]]; [[senior]]; [[top]]
# [[preceding]]; [[previous]]; [[last]]; [[former]]
#* {{zh-x|上 年|last year}}
#* {{zh-x|上 集|last episode}}
# [[first]] of several (usually two or three) partitions
#: {{zh-ant|中|下}}
#* {{zh-x|西遊記 上|Journey to the West I}}
#* {{zh-x|上古.漢語 和 中古.漢語|Old Chinese and Middle Chinese}}
# [[within]], [[in]], from the [[standpoint]] of, [[according to]]
#* {{zh-x|在 理論 上|according to theory}}
#*{{zh-x|在 這個 世界 上|in this world}}
#* {{zh-x|在 ^英文 上 沒有 相似 的 說法。|There is no similar way of wording in English.}}
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[most]]; [[extremely]]
#* {{zh-also|*尚}}

===Pronunciation 2===
{{zh-pron
|m=shàng
|c=soeng5
|h=pfs=sông
|md=siông/chiông
|md_note=siông - "to go up" (major reading); chiông - only in "to pull up"
|mn=xm,tp,kh,yl,hc,tc,sx,km,mg:chiūⁿ/zz,tn:chiōⁿ/qz,lk:chiǔⁿ/xm,tp,kh,yl,hc,tc,sx,km,mg:chhiūⁿ/zz,tn:chhiōⁿ/qz,lk:chhiǔⁿ
|mn_note=chiūⁿ/chiōⁿ/chiǔⁿ - "to go up" (major reading); chhiūⁿ/chhiōⁿ/chhiǔⁿ - only in "to pull up; to grow; to pile up"
|w=3zaan
|mc=1
|oc=1+2,1
|ma=y
|cat=v,part
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[go up]]; to [[ascend]]
# to [[go]] to; to [[leave]] for (a place)
# to [[board]]; to [[get on]]
#* {{zh-x|請 上 車。|Please get into the car.}}
# to [[attend]] (class, work)
#* {{zh-x|上班|to go to work}}
#* {{zh-x|她 上 夜校。|She goes to night school.}}
# to [[enter]] (a field); to [[appear]] (on stage)
# to [[fit]]; to [[install]]; to [[apply]]
# to [[screw]]; to [[tighten]], to [[twist]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} {{zh-abbrev|*上線|to go online}}
# to [[connect]] to, [[browse]] (a website)
#* {{zh-x|上 ^谷歌|to go on Google; to google}}
# {{lb|zh|Min}} to [[pull]] [[upwards]] or [[hang]] with a [[rope]]
#* {{zh-x|上{chhiūⁿ}水|to '''draw''' water from a well|MN}}
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[grow]] and [[attach]]
#* {{zh-x|上{chhiūⁿ} 青苔|to '''grow''' moss|MN}}
# {{lb|zh|Xiamen|_|Min Nan}} to [[pile up]]
#* {{zh-x|上{chhiūⁿ}貨|to '''pile up''' goods|MN}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar|of a male}} to [[fuck]]; to have [[intercourse]] with a female
# {{n-g|Particle following verbs, indicating direction or achievement.}}
